text: “Israelian gumazamiziba, ia asebar ziaba fer dɨpenibar aven, tuavimɨn amiziba ko tuavimɨn gumazibar mɨn otivigh asebar ziam famin arazimɨn gɨn mangɨ, dagɨaba bagh tintinibar gumaziba ko amiziba ko dakuan markɨ.23:17 Dɨpenir Kenania uan asebar ziaba febar aven, gumazamiziba dar ghua tuavir gumaziba ko tuavir amizir aseba fer dɨpenir kabar ingariba isa me koma akui. Men nɨghnɨzir gavgavim kamakɨn, me arazir kam damu asebar ziaba fɨtɨ, aseba men azenibar amutɨ da dagher avɨriba ikɨ, egh uaghan men asɨzibar amutɨ, da nguzir avɨriba batam.
